logline: Three friends compete to make the ultimate smoothie in a playful kitchen showdown filled with humor and unexpected ingredients.

background.description: A bright, colorful kitchen filled with fresh fruits and a blender on the counter.

characters.name: JAKE
characters.description: Mid-20s, laid-back, always wearing a goofy hat, loves trying new things.
characters.style_hint: Casual with a quirky hat, relaxed posture, mischievous grin.
characters.prompt: young man mid-20s, goofy hat, casual clothes, holding banana, playful expression

characters.name: SARAH
characters.description: Early 30s, health-conscious, sarcastic, always prepared with a witty comeback.
characters.style_hint: Smart casual, confident stance, eye-roll or smirk.
characters.prompt: woman early 30s, health-conscious look, sarcastic expression, casual smart outfit

characters.name: MIKE
characters.description: Late 20s, overly enthusiastic, the 'smoothie expert,' a bit clueless.
characters.style_hint: Energetic pose, bright eyes, eager smile.
characters.prompt: young man late 20s, enthusiastic expression, casual sporty clothes

beats.description: Jake stands by the blender holding a banana with a mischievous grin, announcing his smoothie ingredients including gummy bears.
Sarah rolls her eyes, sarcastically questioning Jake's choice of gummy bears for a health smoothie.
Mike enters excitedly, asking if he can add chocolate syrup, claiming it's a superfood.
Jake grins and calls the concoction a 'dessert smoothie' while Sarah smirks calling it a 'regret smoothie.'
Jake presses the blender button; it sputters and sprays smoothie everywhere, leading to laughter among all three.
